Good Afternoon {!Contact.FirstName},
Have you attended a Communications Masterclass run by AGL?
If not, your chance is here!
Delivered by AGL - this exceptional Communication Company will work alongside you to explore the secrets of having a 'good interview'. The Workshop will cover:
What makes authentic communication? Physical aspects of good communication How to answer an Interview Question Interview Top Tips
This masterclass is used for high profile businesses including Vodafone, British Airways and has even trained The Prime Minster.
When: Tuesday 1st September Time: 11am - 1:30pm Where: Vauxhall Gardens Community Centre (SE11 5ES) Invitation: here
Miss It. Miss Out!
**If you have already attended an AGL session or are booked on to Saturday 29th August or 26th September workshop, you do not need to sign up to this event.
If you have any further questions please go get in contact with us. Otherwise, keep clocking up those volunteering hours and get yourself booked on your workshops as soon as possible! We look forward to seeing you all next week!
Any questions? Email the HeadStart team, check out our website or get in touch on facebook.
